title: How to unsubscribe from Allegro Smart!
description: You can cancel your Allegro Smart! subscription at any time with 14 days' notice. You can also withdraw from the agreement without giving a reason within 30 days of the initial purchase.

steps_1.title: Cancel via Online Form
steps_1.description:
*   Go to the Allegro Smart! contact form: [https://na.allegro.pl/smart-formularz-kontaktowy](https://na.allegro.pl/smart-formularz-kontaktowy).
*   Select "Cancellation" on the contact form.
*   Fill out the required information in the form.
*   Submit the cancellation request.
*   Check your email for a correction invoice.
*   Wait for confirmation of your cancellation. Allegro will refund you for the unused period within 14 days to the account you used to pay for the service.

steps_2.title: Cancel via Postal Mail
steps_2.description: *   Send a withdrawal form to Allegro sp. z o.o., ul. Wierzbięcice 1B, 61-569 Poznań within 30 days of purchase.
